thread.title: Yoga Classes Start October 10th
thread.title_full: Yoga Classes Start October 10th - FOX 14 TV Joplin and Pittsburg News Weather Sports |

author: News Release
title: Yoga Classes Start October 10th
text:
PITTSBURG, KANSAS - The Pittsburg Parks and Recreation Department will be hosting new beginner Yoga classes starting in October; Gentle Yoga and Yoga Basics 101. Classes are perfect for those just beginning Yoga, those with physical limitations, or anyone wanting to begin a new journey with Yoga! Classes start on Monday, October 5th and will be held on Mondays and Wednesdays with class fees of $30.00 for a month session.
For more information or to register for class, contact the Pittsburg Parks & Recreation office at 620-231-8310 for more information
